headline: XOP Beats The Odds And Climbs 17.1% Despite Oil Stuck Below $65
summary: The SPDR S&P Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF (NYSEARCA:XOP) tracks a basket of U.S. energy producers at a pivotal moment for the sector. As of February 13, 2026, the fund trades at $147.89, delivering a 17.1% year-to-date gain despite persistent commodity headwinds. This resilience reflects the portfolio’s diversification across upstream producers, even as ... XOP Beats The Odds And Climbs 17.1% Despite Oil Stuck Below $65

headline: Diamondback (FANG) Q4 Earnings Preview: What You Should Know Beyond the Headline Estimates
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of Diamondback (FANG) for the quarter ended December 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.

headline: Diamondback Energy Q4 Earnings Preview: Another Beat Likely?
summary: FANG heads into Q4 earnings with rising Permian output, tight cost control and a positive ESP signaling another potential beat.
